title: Vehicle Counter
description: Utilizes YOLOv8 for real-time object detection and the SORT algorithm for tracking to accurately detect and count vehicles passing through a predefined line in a video feed.

title: Trip Planner
description: AI-based travel planning tool that generates personalized 7-day itineraries based on user preferences using Crew AI, Streamlit, and GPT-4.

title: Proximity
description: Social media app displaying posts only within a 35 km radius. Features authentication, CRUD operations, and infinite scroll.

title: Gesture Groove
description: Computer vision project allowing users to adjust system volume using simple hand gestures by tracking thumb-index finger distance.

title: Ask My PDF
description: Allows users to upload documents and ask questions about their content using AI. Features secure auth and efficient document management.

title: ChurnGuard
description: Deep learning model predicting customer churn for a bank using TensorFlow's ANN, trained on a dataset of 10,000 customers.

title: Lingua
description: AI-driven communication system for seamless translation between speech, text, and Indian Sign Language (ISL).

title: Acquisitions API
description: A containerized API project leveraging Docker, and Arcjet, with automated CI/CD pipelines. Built using Node.js and Express.js, powered by Neon Postgres with Drizzle ORM and Zod for robust validationâ€”engineered to be secure, scalable, and production-grade.
